pageContext.claim: “So here’s what I said, really fast, here’s what I said on Saturday: 'We’re closely following the terrible events unfolding in Charlottesville, Virginia' — this is me speaking. 'We condemn in the strongest, possible terms this egregious display of hatred, bigotry and violence.' That’s me speaking on Saturday.”
pageContext.analysis: The president is misquoting himself. He left off the words that sparked criticism from even Republicans --  "on many sides, on many sides.”
